viewport



GfxViewport

typedef struct {
  int  x;
  int  y;
  uint width;
  uint height;
} GfxViewport;
type: C struct

gfx_viewport_aspect

float gfx_viewport_aspect(const GfxViewport *viewport);
type: C function

gfx_viewport_orthographic_projection

void  gfx_viewport_orthographic_projection(const GfxViewport *viewport, mat4 matrix);
type: C function

gfx_viewport_set

void  gfx_viewport_set(const GfxViewport *viewport);
type: C function

gfx_viewport_set_values

void  gfx_viewport_set_values(int x, int y, uint width, uint height);
type: C function

gfx_viewport_current_orthographic_projection

void  gfx_viewport_current_orthographic_projection(mat4 matrix);
type: C function

gfx_viewport_get

void  gfx_viewport_get(GfxViewport *output);
type: C function
